definition: to close up/to heal (of wound)/to keep one's lips sealed
to confer/to grant/to bestow a title/to seal/classifier for sealed objects, esp. letters
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls

sentences.english: Her Social Security card remained in her papers, the original envelope unopened.
sentences.chinese: 她的社保卡仍然在她的信件里，封口一直没拆开过。

sentences.english: The ball is sealed with a zipper and floats in a pool or a lake.
sentences.chinese: 这个球用一个拉链封口，漂浮在池子或湖里。

sentences.english: These systems utilize lamps which are basically sealed quartz tubes containing the fill material and argon gas.
sentences.chinese: 这些系统主要是利用填充物质和氩气的封口石英管。

sentences.english: When people wanted to send a letter, they would close the paper with a seal.
sentences.chinese: 当人们想寄信时，他们会在信纸上盖封口章。

sentences.english: It adopts double working position for winding, unwinding and sealing.
sentences.chinese: 双工位放料和收卷，双工位封口。

sentences.english: Dedicated to after the aluminum foil sealing, to tight the loosen lid again.
sentences.chinese: 专用于铝箔封口后，再次给松动的盖子旋紧。

sentences.english: Micro-controlled system with film detection ensures high precision in sealing.
sentences.chinese: 微电脑全自动追踪封口，胶膜定点，确保封膜准确。

sentences.english: Intermittent clutch or accumulator seal performance.
sentences.chinese: 间歇离合器或贮积器封口性能。

sentences.english: The capper comes equipped with an elevator cap feeder and with 304 stainless steel cladding as standard.
sentences.chinese: 该封口机配备电梯封盖机和304不锈钢包层为标准。

sentences.english: A plastic sealing layer is arranged at the inner part of the sealing cover sheet.
sentences.chinese: 在封口盖片的内部设有塑胶密封层。

sentences.english: The newspapers that opposed the junta were effectively muzzled by strict censorship laws.
sentences.chinese: 严厉的审查法律有效地使反对军人干政的报纸封口。

sentences.english: Plus, full seam sealing reinforces all stitching lines to stop moisture short.
sentences.chinese: 另外，全煤封口缝合线，以加强所有停止水分短。

sentences.english: Ensure that the pack is properly resealed to prevent wipes drying out.
sentences.chinese: 确保包装封口闭合，防止净肤棉脱水变干。

sentences.english: We dont accept parcels sealed with Scotch tape.
sentences.chinese: 我们不接受用透明胶封口的包裹。

sentences.english: This batch of your products have a problem: all of the package bags were broken at the sealing area.
sentences.chinese: 这批次的产品全部在包装袋的封口处呈现破包问题。

definition: to dismantle/to disassemble/to open up (sth sealed)/to unpick
to sell at a 50% discount/to fold in two
